concepts.label: Median Household Income
concepts.definition: The median income of households in the past 12 months (in inflation-adjusted dollars)

concepts.label: Mean Household Income
concepts.definition: The average (arithmetic mean) income of households in the past 12 months

concepts.label: Poverty Rate
concepts.universe: Population for whom poverty status is determined
concepts.definition: Percentage of people whose income in the past 12 months was below the poverty threshold

concepts.label: Unemployment Rate
concepts.universe: Civilian labor force 16 years and over
concepts.definition: Percentage of the civilian labor force that is unemployed

concepts.label: Median Family Income
concepts.definition: The median income of families in the past 12 months (in inflation-adjusted dollars)

concepts.label: Per Capita Income
concepts.definition: Mean income computed for every man, woman, and child in a particular group

concepts.label: Child Poverty Rate
concepts.universe: Population under 18 years for whom poverty status is determined
concepts.definition: Percentage of children under 18 years with income below poverty level

concepts.label: Mean Commute Time
concepts.universe: Workers 16 years and over who did not work at home
concepts.definition: Mean travel time to work for workers
